Hey there! I'm Theo Harris

I'm a full-stack web developer with a passion for beautiful websites that don't compromise accessibility.

I firmly believe that the web is for everyone, and that everyone should be able to enjoy online content. I also don't believe in boring websites - nothing makes me leave a website faster than a bland UI! As a dev with a keen interest in front-end technologies, I want to be someone who builds websites that keep customers coming back.
